name: vpnn VPN client software
short_description: vpnn is a fork of vpnc-0.3.2 that enables vpnc to connect with Nortel Contivity VPN servers. Source code is now available through the vpnc Subversion server: http://svn.unix-ag.uni-kl.de/vpnc/branches/vpnc-nortel This site may be used more in the future.
